_A Paying Ghost_ (qv) (PG) is a story based on a famous novel ''Badali'' authored by Vasant Purushottam Kale (V.P Kale). The story narrates the interaction between a common innocent man and a homeless ghost family. A horror film with streaks of fun and laughter and it also brings experience into the magical world of the Ghosts.

Madhav a simple man lives alone in a Chawl he is no parents or siblings.His neighbor Vrunda likes him and tries to win his heart, but he is in love with Madhavi working in his office.Vasant is Madhav's only friend who helps in in tricky situations .Once while Madhav is returning late home from work he meets a family of ghost, Gajanan Ekbote, wife Shevanta Ekbote with their six daughters.The ghost and his family have no place to stay and ask Madhav for shelter in his house in return they will take care of his house and do all work.Madhav slowly gets use to the ghost family he finds from Vasant that Madhavi is getting married.But Gajanan and Shevanta make it possible that Madhav gets married to Madhavi.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
